Banner.title: Software Developer
Banner.Description: I have 2 years of experience in web and desktop application development. I focus on writing clean and reusable code across various technologies, applying best practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 2 years of experience, I've taken on various roles: web developer, desktop application developer. I enjoy using my skills to create innovative solutions that solve problems.
My skills include implementing system improvements, optimizing websites, standardizing templates, and executing ideas that add value to the projects I work on.
I also program projects for personal use, out of interest or necessity.
The technologies I've worked with include (but are not limited to): Java, Spring Boot, Angular, Laravel, NodeJS, React, Java Swing, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Laravel Developer Intern
Description: Created a web application for tracking production activities.

Experience.Jobs.Title: NodeJS and React Developer
Description: Developed a software for managing school supply kits.

Experience.Jobs.Title: JAVA Swing Developer Intern
Description: Created a school stock management application.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-commerce Project
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed an E-commerce project using Spring Boot and Angular.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Client Management for a Bank
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Designed and developed a client management project for a bank using Java Web and Servlet. This software includes account creation, withdrawal, deposit, and money transfer functionalities.

OtherProjects.Title: Other Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Wholesale Sales Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed sales management applications for a wholesaler with two different interfaces (Desktop, Web). These applications handle billing and sales statistics.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Student Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a student management project. This application manages student grades.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Housing Sales Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a web application for housing sales management, accepting payment in two installments.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Mobile App for Student Merit Scholarships
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created a mobile app for managing students eligible for merit scholarships.

Contact.Title: Get in Touch!
Contact.Content: I'd love to discuss new opportunities with you. Write to me, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
